header-intro:
Privacy and freedom
without the hassle.
title-dialog-terms-alpha: Confirm Open Alpha Terms Of Service
subtitle-proxy-use-proxy: This will force all traffic leaving Syphon to do so via a proxy
subtitle-proxy-use-basic-authentication: Provide username and password to authenticate with a proxy
subtitle-settings-sync-interval:
Amount of time in seconds the app wait
between syncing
subtitle-settings-sync-toggle: Toggle syncing with the matrix server
subtitle-toggle-autocorrect: Beware that keyboards may send autocorrect data to third-parties
subtitle-toggle-suggestions: Beware that keyboards may send suggestions data to third-parties
label-call-invite: User invited you to a voice call
alert-restart-app-effect: You'll need to close and restart the app for this to take effect
alert-invite-user-unknown:
This user doesn't appear to exist within matrix, but you can attempt to invite them anyway.

Make sure you have the correct name before trying.
alert-feature-in-progress: ðŸ›  This feature is coming soon
alert-homeserver-invalid: This server failed the 'well-known' check. Make sure the server is configured correctly.
alert-hidden-read-receipts: Hidden Read Receipts must be supported by your homeserver, or this will have the same effect as switching Read Receipts 'On'
alert-offline: Looks like you may be offline. Check your connection and try again.
prompt-confirm-deactivate: Enter your password below to confirm deactivation
content-password-recommendation:
Try thinking up 3 or more random
words you'll easily remember
content-intro-section-one:
{} works by using an encrypted 
and decentralized network 
called
content-intro-section-two: Matrix enables you to message others
content-intro-section-three:
Both Matrix and {} are developed
openly by organizations and people,
not corporations
content-intro-section-four:
By using {} and other Matrix clients,
we can make private messaging 
accessible to everyone
content-captcha-warning:
Some Matrix servers require captcha confirmation provided by Google through reCAPTCHA. 

If you'd prefer not to complete this captcha, you may need to go back to server select and choose a different server for account creation.
content-dialog-devices-delete: You will have to sign in again on these devices if you remove them.
content-dialog-devices-key-export: Are you sure you want to export this device's encryption key? It may make it available to others if you're not careful!
content-dialog-device-rename: Enter the new public display name for this device.
content-signup-email-requirement: This homeserver requires an email for registration. Your email will be visible to whoever or whatever is in control of the homeserver. Make sure you trust this homeserver before submitting this information
content-signup-email-verification: This homeserver requires a verified email to complete registration. You'll need to click the link in the email address to continue. Make sure you trust this homeserver before clicking the verification link.
content-signup-captcha-requirement:
This homeserver requires a captcha
 before you can create an account.
content-forgot-email-verification: A verification email will be sent to your inbox before resetting your password. After verification, you'll be able to set and confirm a new password.
content-confirm-password-reset: Click on the link sent to your email. After clicking the link, press the continue button below to change your password.
content-password-requirements:
Each homeserver may have different requirements for passwords.

If you're having trouble, try creating a password including a lower-case letter, an upper-case letter, a number and a symbol, and with at least 8 characters
content-sync-interval: Syncing works by submitting a long poll request to a matrix server. The sync interval is not how frequently it will sync, but how frequently it will attempt a new long poll request.
content-proxy-port: The port your proxy is listening on
content-proxy-username: The username for authenticating with your proxy
content-proxy-password: The password for authenticating with your proxy
content-notification-style-type-inbox: Group new messages within one notification
content-notification-style-type-latest: Show one notification with the most recent message
content-notification-style-type-itemized: A new notification will appear for every new message
confirm-linkout:
Are you sure you want to open the following link?

{}
confirm-delete-keys: Are you sure you want to delete your encryption keys for this device? This is very destructive and will probably render all your encrypted messages undecryptable.
confirm-invite: Are you sure you want to invite the following users?
confirm-invites-multiple: Are you sure you want to invite the selected users to the following chat?
confirm-start-chat: Even if you don't send a message, the user will still see your invite to chat.
confirm-attempt-chat:
Even if you don't send a message, the user will still see your invite to chat if they exist.

Do you want to try chatting with this username?
confirm-terms-of-service: THIS SOFTWARE ({}) IS PROVIDED BY THE AUTHOR ''AS IS'' AND ANY EXPRESS OR IMPLIED WARRANTIES, INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, THE IMPLIED WARRANTIES OF MERCHANTABILITY AND FITNESS FOR A PARTICULAR PURPOSE ARE DISCLAIMED. IN NO EVENT SHALL THE AUTHOR BE LIABLE FOR ANY DIRECT, INDIRECT, INCIDENTAL, SPECIAL, EXEMPLARY, OR CONSEQUENTIAL DAMAGES (INCLUDING, BUT NOT LIMITED TO, PROCUREMENT OF SUBSTITUTE GOODS OR SERVICES; LOSS OF USE, DATA, OR PROFITS; OR BUSINESS INTERRUPTION) HOWEVER CAUSED AND ON ANY THEORY OF LIABILITY, WHETHER IN CONTRACT, STRICT LIABILITY, OR TORT (INCLUDING NEGLIGENCE OR OTHERWISE) ARISING IN ANY WAY OUT OF THE USE OF THIS SOFTWARE, EVEN IF ADVISED OF THE POSSIBILITY OF SUCH DAMAGE.
confirm-enable-notifications:
Your device will now prompt you to turn on notifications for {}.

Do you want to turn on message notifications?
confirm-auth-verification: In order to perform this action, you'll need to enter your password again
confirm-alpha-version: Please be aware this app is still very much in Alpha.
confirm-alpha-warning: Do not use, nor do I recommend using, Syphon where proven and independently verified security is required.
confirm-alpha-warning-alt: You may lose data using this application as features and bugs are worked out.
confirm-terms-of-service-alt: Please read the below terms and conditions for this application and if you agree tap "I Agree" to continue:
confirm-invite-accept: If you accept this chat invite, the users in the chat will be made aware you've accepted. Are you sure you want to accept now?
confirm-encryption: After you encrypt a chat, you cannot go back to sending messages unencrypted. Are you sure you want to encrypt this chat?
confirm-encryption-group:
After you encrypt a chat, you cannot go back to sending messages unencrypted. Are you sure you want to encrypt this group chat?

Please be aware Group E2EE is still a work in progress. You may lose message data!
confirm-advanced-colors:
Are you sure you want to use advanced color selection?

Selecting the same color
as the background may prevent you from seeing parts of the app!
confirm-archive-chat-single:
Are you sure you want to archive the chat "{}"?
{} does not yet support viewing archived chats.
confirm-archive-chat-multi:
Are you sure you want to archive all {} selected chats?
{} does not yet support viewing archived chats.
confirm-delete-chat-single: Are you sure you want to delete the chat "{}"? Messages sent in this chat will be lost forever.
confirm-delete-chat-multi: Are you sure you want to delete all {} selected chats? Messages sent in these chats will be lost forever.
confirm-leave-chat-single: Are you sure you want to leave the chat "{}"?
confirm-leave-chat-single-nonpublic: This is not a public chat. You will not be able to rejoin this chat without an invitation.
confirm-leave-chat-multi: Are you sure you want to leave all {} selected chats?
confirm-leave-chat-multi-nonpublic: Some or all of these chats are not public. You will not be able to rejoin these chats without an invitation.
confirm-block-user: If you block {}, you will not be able to see their messages and you will immediately leave this chat.
warning-deactivate-account:
THIS WILL PERMANENTLY DELETE YOUR ACCOUNT

You will be unable to recover any data or access for this account after deactivation.
Please take careful consideration before doing this!
warning-deactivate-account-final:
There is no way to recover this account after it's deleted. You will immediately be logged out of your account and it will become unavailable.

This is your final warning regarding deactivation. If you are sure, press deactivate below.

semantics-image-intro-section-third: People lounging around and messaging each other
semantics-image-intro-section-four: Two different people feeling confident and lookin' good

semantics-image-terms-of-service: Hand holding a phone with a terms of service checkbox checked
semantics-image-signup-username: Person resting elbow on I.D. card
semantics-image-password-reset: Person resting arm ontop a letter with a checkbox inside
